title: Aberdeen's Greg Tansey makes temporary move to Ross County
description: Aberdeen midfielder Greg Tansey has joined Ross County in a loan deal until the end of the season.
content: Tansey joined Aberdeen from Inverness Caledonian Thistle last summer but injuries have restricted him to just 10 appearances for the Dons this season.The 29-year-old is currently recovering from groin surgery and last played for Aberdeen in November's clash with Rangers at Ibrox.Ross County manager, Owen Coyle, said: "I am delighted to bring such a talented and experienced player as Greg to the club."He has excelled in the Ladbrokes Premiership for a number of years and I look forward to working with him."
